org.daisy.pipeline.braille.css.xpath

Class Style

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.braille.css.xpath.Style

  • public abstract class Style
extends Object
    Interface for accessing braille CSS styles from XPath.

      • merge

        public static Optional<Style> merge(Iterator<Object> styles)
        Merge a sequence of styles. Properties are overwritten by properties declared in following style items.
